headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Carrier Global’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Carrier Global’s first quarter results drew a positive market reaction, with management highlighting robust growth in Climate Solutions Americas and steady aftermarket gains. CEO David Gitlin credited stronger-than-expected orders—particularly in residential and commercial segments in the Americas—and improved productivity for supporting margin expansion. The company also cited progress in aftermarket attachment rates and successful mitigation of tariff-related cost pressures as key contributors
